KPIs.Name: Ownership
KPIs.Description: High Sense of Urgency, Availability, and Ownership

KPIs.Name: Decision Making
KPIs.Description: Able & willing to consider all facts before making a decision

KPIs.Name: Planner
KPIs.Description: Anticipates and prepares for future needs and challenges

KPIs.Name: Innovative
KPIs.Description: Ability to find innovative procedures & solutions to problems

KPIs.Name: Team player
KPIs.Description: Support team spirit and working as part of the team

KPIs.Name: Flexible
KPIs.Description: Flexible and adaptive while dealing with different situations

KPIs.Name: Good Listener
KPIs.Description: Listens well and accepts other ideas and criticism

KPIs.Name: Team Coaching
KPIs.Description: Audit, coach, counsel & follow-up on his team members

KPIs.Name: Team Reviews
KPIs.Description: Conducting fair, constructive, objective & timely team feedback

KPIs.Name: Career Development
KPIs.Description: Career path planning and development for team members

KPIs.Name: Bench Management
KPIs.Description: Vacation, training, knowledge transfers, or internal projects

KPIs.Name: Processes & Standards
KPIs.Description: Owning, maintaining, & governing team processes & standards

KPIs.Name: Technical Skills
KPIs.Description: Depth of technical expertise & knowledge of new technologies
